title: build(deps): bump tokio from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: rust
labels.description: Pull requests that update Rust code

body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.9.0

1.9.0 (July 19, 2021)

Added

  • net: allow customized I/O operations for TcpStream (#3888)
  • sync: add getter for the mutex from a guard (#3928)
  • task: expose nameable future for TaskLocal::scope (#3273)

Fixed

  • Fix leak if output of future panics on drop (#3967)
  • Fix leak in LocalSet (#3978)

Changes

  • runtime: reorganize parts of the runtime (#3909, #3939, #3950, #3955, #3980)
  • sync: clean up OnceCell (#3945)
  • task: remove mutex in JoinError (#3959)

#3273: tokio-rs/tokio#3273 #3888: tokio-rs/tokio#3888 #3909: tokio-rs/tokio#3909 #3928: tokio-rs/tokio#3928 #3934: tokio-rs/tokio#3934 #3939: tokio-rs/tokio#3939 #3945: tokio-rs/tokio#3945 #3950: tokio-rs/tokio#3950 #3955: tokio-rs/tokio#3955 #3959: tokio-rs/tokio#3959 #3967: tokio-rs/tokio#3967 #3967: tokio-rs/tokio#3967 #3978: tokio-rs/tokio#3978 #3980: tokio-rs/tokio#3980

Commits
  • b280c6d chore: prepare Tokio v1.9.0 (#3961)
  • 998dc5a task: fix leak in LocalSet (#3978)
  • ced7992 runtime: add large test and fix leak it found (#3967)
  • 0cefa85 runtime: make scheduler non-optional (#3980)
  • 2087f3e runtime: rework binding of new tasks (#3955)
  • 5ae2855 io: fix docs referring to clear_{read,write}_ready (#3957)
  • 2520048 sync: add getter for the mutex from a guard (#3928)
  • 549e89e chore: use the loom mutex wrapper everywhere (#3958)
  • c8fc492 Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/tokio-1.8.x' into merge-1.8
  • 7c4183a runtime: drop future when polling cancelled future (#3965)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=tokio&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=1.8.2&new-version=1.9.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
